Name: artery disease
Definition: A vascular disease that is located_in an artery.

Name: thrombosis
Definition: A vascular disease caused by the formation of a blood clot inside a blood vessel

Name: supine hypotensive syndrome
Definition: A vascular disease that is characterized by severe supine hypotension in late pregnancy

Name: obsolete maternal distress
Definition: A vascular disease that is characterized by severe supine hypotension in late pregnancy

Name: capillary disease
Definition: A vascular disease that is located_in the capillaries.

Name: obsolete Histoplasma duboisii pneumonia
Definition: An African histoplasmosis that results_in inflammation located_in lung

Name: cholesterol embolism
Definition: A vascular disease that is characterized by blood vessel obstruction resulting from the release of cholesterol from the inside of blood vessels along the bloodstream.

Name: obsolete Salmonella septicemia
Definition: A vascular disease that is characterized by blood vessel obstruction resulting from the release of cholesterol from the inside of blood vessels along the bloodstream.

Name: angiodysplasia
Definition: A vascular disease that is characterized as a small vascular malformation of the gut.
Synonym: angiodysplasia of stomach and duodenum with hemorrhage

Name: thoracic outlet syndrome
Definition: A vascular disease that is characterized by compression at the superior thoracic outlet[1] resulting from excess pressure placed on a neurovascular bundle passing between the anterior scalene and middle scalene muscles.

Name: obsolete Nematoda infectious disease
Definition: A parasitic helminthiasis infectious disease that involves infection by parasitic roundworms including ascarids

Name: ischemia
Definition: A vascular disease that is characterized by a restriction in blood supply to tissues.

Name: peripheral vascular disease
Definition: A vascular disease that is characterized by obstruction of larger arteries not within the coronary

Name: angiomyoma
Definition: A leiomyoma that is located_in the blood vessels.

Name: intravenous leiomyomatosis
Definition: A leiomyomatosis that is located within the blood vessels.

Name: vasculitis
Definition: A vascular disease that is characterized by inflammation of the blood vessels.

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's granuloma involving intrapelvic lymph nodes
Definition: A vascular disease that is characterized by inflammation of the blood vessels.
Synonym: Hodgkin's granuloma of intrapelvic lymph nodes (disorder)

Name: vein disease
Definition: A vascular disease that is located_in a vein.
